</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if file is signed by any key present in game keys folders. Note: On client, it does not check against the keys accepted by server. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Boolean]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''verifySignature''' filename </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> filename: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[verifySignature]] "@MyAddon\Addons\SomeAddon.pbo";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[verifySignature]] "@MyAddon\Somefnc.dll";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
